package.name: HTTP_Download
package.description:
Provides an easy interface to send hidden files or any arbitrary data to the client over HTTP. It features HTTP Caching, Compression and Ranges (partial downloads and resuming).
NOTE: Don't use with PHP's on-the-fly output compression, because files may be sent corrupted.

release.notes: * License updated to PHP License 3.0 * State changed from alpha to beta
